title: Ask Charlie Anything 121: What Actually Is a Marxist? Pareto Principle? America's Marxist Military?
itunes:title: Ask Charlie Anything 121: What Actually Is a Marxist? Pareto Principle? America's Marxist Military?
description:
On this 121st episode of Ask Charlie Anything, Charlie takes the questions you email him at Freedom@CharlieKirk.com including: 

We've all heard the term Marxist time and again, but what in the world is an actual Marxist? Charlie dives deep into the details of the Pareto Principle and explains why inherent to lived experience, disparate outcomes are bound to happen. How has Marxism infiltrated our military, especially our Air Force? Finally, why are abortion fanatics like AOC obsessed with America's collapsing fertility rate? And MORE

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
